channel.title: Magic and Ranged not working properly
channel.description:
Ranged problems: -Against monsters it isnt ranged -Hits low on monsters (like 120 max with c c'bow) and a bit higher on pvp (250 was my max hit) but still not enough (THE BONUSES ARE THERE) I think the problem is that it loads the melee bonuses, like loading Slash Stab and Crush isntead of loading Ranged bonuses
Magic problems: -Against monsters it isnt ranged -I am not sure of this but I think it also hits low, if you can fix ranged problem try this also :)
My combat is not really good, if you can add a decent combat with good ranged magic and melee I would be apreaciated
